snippet.title: Thanksgiving isn't the only colorful harvest festival...
snippet.description:
* There are all sorts of ways to celebrate a successful harvest. In U.S. of course, people commemorate the season's bounty by giving thanks, overdosing on roast turkey, and turning on the TV to watch an endless parade of cartoon characters float about the streets of New York.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/11/28/travel/thanksgiving-isnt-the-only-colorful-harvest-festival/index.html

snippet.title: Showbuzz
snippet.description:
* NEW YORK (Hollywood Reporter) -- Andre 3000, one-half of the chart-topping hip-hop group OutKast, is developing a potential series project with Cartoon Network.
http://www.cnn.com/2004/SHOWBIZ/05/10/showbuzz/index.html

snippet.title: Ed Hardy: From art to infamy and back again
snippet.description:
* The name Ed Hardy conjures visions of rhinestone-studded trucker hats, colorful cartoon skulls, dragons and koi fish, and reality stars like Jon Gosselin and the cast of Jersey Shore.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/09/04/living/fashion-ed-hardy-profile/index.html

snippet.title: Iran's cartoonists find new lines of expression
snippet.description:
* In 2003, former newspaper editor Ali Reza Eshraghi made a mistake that cost him his freedom: he published a cartoon.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/04/16/world/meast/iran-satire-cartoonists/index.html

snippet.title: Mideast conflict forces animation to grow up
snippet.description:
* Everyone has their childhood favorite: whether it is the hand-drawn beauty of "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs;" or the modern, computer-generated genius of "Shrek." Cartoons have always been a family staple in the movie industry.
http://www.cnn.com/2008/SHOWBIZ/Movies/05/23/waltz.bashir/index.html

snippet.title: 'Shrek 2' shakes up box office
snippet.description:
* "Shrek 2," a cartoon revolving around a green ogre and his princess bride, trampled even the most optimistic forecasts as it set several new opening records at the weekend box office and kick-started the lucrative summer moviegoing season into high gear.
http://www.cnn.com/2004/SHOWBIZ/Movies/05/23/box.office.reut/index.html

snippet.title: Asiaweek
snippet.description:
* She may have been only a cartoon character, but when Lily Wong disappeared from the pages of Hong Kongs South China Morning Post two years ago, there was quite a fuss
http://www.cnn.com/ASIANOW/asiaweek/97/0404/feat7.html

snippet.title: With food, drink and candles, Sweden embraces Christmas
snippet.description:
* Sweden is a Mecca for yulophiles, those merry souls who love Christmas. The Swedish jul (pronounced "yule") season is a month-long national festival of lighted candles, savory feasts and strong spirits -- celebratory and liquid.
http://www.cnn.com/2000/TRAVEL/DESTINATIONS/12/22/sweden.christmas/index.html

snippet.title: Artistry in motion Animators vie for Cartoon dOr
snippet.description:
* CORDOBA, Spain From modern legends to variations of ancient myths, animated films from across Europe competed recently in Spain for a unique prize the Cartoon dOr.
http://www.cnn.com/WORLD/europe/9909/28/animation.festival/index.html

snippet.title: Children's books light up the holidays
snippet.description:
* With the television as the center of just about every American living room, it may be natural to think about holiday entertainment as Claymation Christmas specials and holiday cartoons.
http://www.cnn.com/2003/SHOWBIZ/books/12/16/sprj.hs03.childrens.books/index.html
